title: How to photograph wildlife you can't see
description: When I think of wildlife photography, I think of telephoto lenses on expensive cameras in the Sahara desert. That was until I saw the wildlife camera trapping that Carla Rhodes was doing. I knew I needed to try it for myself in Brooklyn, NY.
